name: Docs bar for 1C Bitrix (alkom:media.docbar)
tagline: Bar of items from Medialibrary's collection with permissions for 1C Bitrix
body:
# Docs Bar. (alkom:media.docbar)
Bar of items from Medialibrary's collection with permissions for 1C Bitrix.

***

## How to install?
Download .zip and unpack it to %BitrixRoot%/bitrix/components/


## How to use?
2 Ways:
* Add "Docs bar" component in Page Editor in 1C Bitrix
* Put the next php code in the need place:

`<? $APPLICATION->IncludeComponent("alkom:media.docbar", ".default", array(),	false); ?>`



_Don't forget set settings in Bitrix Editor!_

**Enjoy it!**
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
